author: Special Correspondent
text:
A school student was fatally knocked down by a sand laden lorry at Mayiladi near Kulithalai on Wednesday.

Sources said the accident occurred when the deceased John David (16), who was studying Plus One in a government school at Ayyarrmalai, and his brother Mohandas (13), studying in Class-7, were going to Kottamedu from V. Pudur by a motor cycle.

Of them, John David succumbed to injuries at the Mahatma Gandhi Medical College Government Hospital in Tiruchi.

The Kulithalai police have registered a case.
title: Lorry knocks down school student
